text: @5urelocke So do you want to meet up at a cafe tomorrow? It's about a block away from your office, next to a library. I heard they have good donuts there.
just solved another INTENSE case today. #hardboileddetectiveing
Can't wait to see the new Power Traingers episode on Sunday!
True to the rumors, the library cafe's Froggo Donuts are really good!
YEAHHH NO WORK! SATURDAYZ R THE BEST!
Urghafjewkl... How do I give relationship advice??
I'm so sick of couples. I never want to see a couple in my life ever again.
Thank goodness I have a day off tomorrow.
i hate mondays i hate mondays i hate mondays Why do people have to work on Mondays?
Boss wants me to work all week. Well then, wheres my raise?
My dayoff on Friday feels so long away...
OH SWEET! My favorite writer's having a autograph signing!
Something to look forward to: My favorite mystery novel author is having a signing soon!
Power Traingers is not a kid's show!
Chief says I didn't meet my arrest quota :(
OK even if it IS a show targetted towards kids, that doesn't mean adults can't watch them!
Oh wow, I suddenly got the day off tomorrow.
If you think about it, it's amazing that Power Traingers is a show that can appeal to BOTH kids and adults!
I can't believe I got to meet another fan of my favorite author... but of all people.
I know it's a cliche, but I might not be able to go on without Froggo Donuts.
There's a Power Traingers event at the amusement park. I have to go.
I can't believe I'll have to go THERE for a case.
Looks like I'll have a lot of work this upcoming week.
I don't know what to do...
Saw a cop cruising on her motorcycle today and it was super cool! ...I want a motorcycle.
Maybe... I'll take a break tomorrow...
There's somewhere I want to go...
